TopicTitle: Stock Kerbalized Soyuz pod for Making History.

Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone i'm just wondering if @SQUAD or developers can add a stockalike Soyuz command pod reentry capsule and service bay or something like that for 1.5.2 or 1.5.3? 

Thanks for reading this suggestion.

If you really want a stock version now, the best you can do is stick the KV-3 Pomegranate on a 1.875 meter fairing and build the fairing to match the shape of the Soyuz capsule, make sure to disable staging though. You can then just put a Heat shield on the fairing.

For the service bay I just used the SM-18 Service Module. Really the only thing I omitted was the bottom of it where it gets wider on the real one. Only reason being because I couldn't get it to look right with my fairing.
Yep a 1.875m Soyuz capsule would be really nice to have.
